name: Queensland Traffic Crash
description: Analysing traffic crash data in Queensland to understand the trends and patterns of traffic crashes. The analysis helps the government to make better decisions in road safety and traffic management.

name: Fibit
description: Analysing Fibit data to understand user's activity and sleep patterns, and provide recommendations to improve their health and fitness levels.

name: Domino's Pizza Sales
description: Analysing Domino's Pizza sales data to understand the sales trend and customer behaviour. The analysis helps the company to make better decisions in marketing and sales strategies.

name: SpaceX
description: Final capstone project for IBM Professional Certificate in Data Science.

name: Titanic Survival Prediction
description: Applying PySpark and machine learning algorithms to predict the survival of passengers on the Titanic.

name: Programming Languages Trends Analysis
description: Analysing the trends of programming languages based on the data from Stack Overflow. Understanding the popularity of programming languages to help developers make better decisions.

name: E-commerce Backend API
description: Building a RESTful API for e-commerce system using Python FastAPI.

name: My Portfolio
description: Building my portfolio website by using Astro.js with Aria template.
